item.title: Thank You for Joining
item.description: Thank you for subscribing! Thought I’d share some of the most work which the community has found useful over the years: Most Helpful Links Confused on how to get started with NLP in your Programming language? Check out Awesome NLP The State of the Art for Natural Langauge Processing is tracked at NLP Progress Looking for Machine Learning and Deep Learning Project Ideas which you can try on your own?
